title: Getting Started with Sendexa
description: Learn how to set up and start using Sendexa in just a few minutes. This comprehensive guide covers installation, configuration, and your first email campaign.
author: Sendexa Team

body.raw:
## Welcome to Sendexa Sendexa is a powerful email marketing and automation platform designed to help you engage with your audience effectively. Whether you're a small startup or an established business, Sendexa provides the tools you need to create, send, and track professional email campaigns. Have Sendexa already? Jump straight to creating your first campaign by heading to the dashboard. ## Prerequisites Before you get started, make sure you have the following: - A Sendexa account (sign up at [sendexa.co](https://sendexa.co)) - A verified email domain or subdomain - Basic understanding of email marketing concepts - Access to your DNS settings (for domain verification) ## Step 1: Create Your Account 1. Visit [sendexa.co](https://sendexa.co) and click **"Get Started"** 2. Enter your email address and create a strong password 3. Check your email for a verification link and click it 4. Complete your profile information We recommend using a business email address to keep your account professional and secure. ## Step 2: Verify Your Domain To ensure maximum email deliverability, you need to verify your domain: ### Add DNS Records Navigate to **Settings â†’ Domains** and follow these steps: 1. Click **"Add Domain"** 2. Enter your domain name (e.g., `mail.yourcompany.com`) 3. Copy the CNAME records provided 4. Log into your domain registrar (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.) 5. Add the CNAME records to your DNS settings 6. Return to Sendexa and click **"Verify Domain"** DNS propagation can take 24-48 hours. If verification fails, wait a bit and try again. ### DNS Records You'll Need | Record Type | Name | Value | |------------|------|-------| | CNAME | sendmail | sendmail.sendexa.co | | TXT | dkim | v=DKIM1; p=YOUR_DKIM_KEY | | TXT | _dmarc | v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; | ## Step 3: Set Up Your First Contact List Contact lists are the foundation of your email marketing: Create a New List Go to **Contacts â†’ Lists** and click **"Create New List"**. Give it a memorable name like "Newsletter Subscribers". Configure List Settings Set default sender name and email address, then configure list-specific reply-to settings. Add Contacts Import contacts via CSV, connect your CRM, or add them manually through the dashboard. ## Step 4: Create Your First Campaign Now it's time to send your first email: ### Campaign Types Newsletter Promotional Transactional Regular emails sent to your subscriber list with updates and news. Time-sensitive campaigns designed to drive action (sales, events, etc). Automated emails triggered by user actions (welcome emails, confirmations, etc). ### Creating Your Campaign 1. Go to **Campaigns â†’ New Campaign** 2. Select your campaign type 3. Choose your audience (contact list) 4. Design your email using the drag-and-drop editor 5. Set up A/B testing (optional) 6. Schedule or send immediately Use personalization tags like `{{firstName}}` to make your emails feel more personal. ## Step 5: Design Your Email The email editor is intuitive and powerful: ``` Basic Structure: â”œâ”€â”€ Header (Logo, navigation) â”œâ”€â”€ Hero Image â”œâ”€â”€ Main Content â”œâ”€â”€ Call-to-Action Button â””â”€â”€ Footer (Links, unsubscribe) ``` ### Best Practices - **Keep it mobile-friendly**: 60% of emails are opened on mobile devices - **Use clear CTAs**: Make your call-to-action button prominent and obvious - **Test before sending**: Use the preview feature to check across devices - **Optimize images**: Compress images to reduce file size - **Keep it concise**: Aim for 150-200 words in the body {`

Welcome to Sendexa

Hi {{firstName}},

Thanks for joining us. We're excited to have you on board.

Get Started `} ## Step 6: Monitor Your Results After sending your campaign, track its performance: ### Key Metrics to Watch | Metric | What It Means | |--------|---------------| | **Delivery Rate** | % of emails successfully delivered | | **Open Rate** | % of recipients who opened the email | | **Click Rate** | % of recipients who clicked a link | | **Conversion Rate** | % of clicks that led to desired action | | **Bounce Rate** | % of emails that failed to deliver | | **Unsubscribe Rate** | % of people who opted out | ## Next Steps Congratulations! You've created your first email campaign. Here's what to do next: **Explore Automation**: Set up email sequences that trigger based on user behavior. 1. **Build Automations** - Create triggered email sequences 2. **Segment Your Audience** - Send targeted campaigns to specific groups 3. **Test and Optimize** - A/B test subject lines, content, and CTAs 4. **Integrate Tools** - Connect your CRM, e-commerce platform, or other tools 5. **Set Up Analytics** - Track conversions and ROI ## Common Questions This can happen due to domain verification issues, poor sender reputation, or flagged content. Check your DKIM/SPF settings and review email content for spam triggers. Yes! When creating a campaign, select "Schedule" instead of "Send Now" to choose when your email should be delivered. Generally, Tuesday-Thursday at 10 AM in your recipient's timezone performs well, but test different times to find what works for your audience. ## Resources - ðŸ“š [Full Documentation](https://docs.sendexa.co) - ðŸŽ“ [Email Marketing Academy](https://academy.sendexa.co) - ðŸ’¬ [Community Forum](https://community.sendexa.co) - ðŸ“§ [Support Email](mailto:support@sendexa.co) - ðŸŽ¬ [Video Tutorials](https://youtube.com/sendexa) ## Need Help? Our support team is here for you: - **Email**: support@sendexa.co - **Chat**: Available in the dashboard (Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST) - **Documentation**: Comprehensive guides for every feature --- You're all set! Start building amazing email campaigns with Sendexa today. Happy emailing! ðŸš€
